content: **knitted socks in drops fabel the piece is worked top down with rib sizes 35 - 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-529 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 22-24-26 cm leg height 19-20-21 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-150 g colour 115 light grey **needles** drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
